summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BERON 24'' Long Wavy Dark Roots Ombre Blonde Sythentic Full Wigs with Wig Cap and Comb (Brown Ombre Light Blonde)
Review Date: 2018/08/30
Store: BERON
Product Description: ['About Our Wig', '1.Rose net cap, more breathable and ajustable. 2.Our wig was made from premium synthetic fiber, please wash it with the shampoo the first time wearing. 3.All synthetic hair wigs are heat safe and can be curled and flat ironed. Please note that the heat settings must below 150c/302f. 4.All our wigs are with adjustable inner cap net, one size fits most. 5.You can cut or trim the wig into any style you like.', 'Specification', 'Type of hair: premium heat resistant synthetic fiber  Color: Brown Ombre Light Blonde  Length: 60cm/24" Weight: around 250g/set', 'Notice', '1.The color may appear slightly different due the lighting, camera angles and different computer /cell phone monitors. 2.The length of our wigs are measured from "crown to end", it will be vary from person to person. The individual’s height, neck, head and face measurements can make the length appear longer or shorter.', 'Maintenance', '1. Care and maintain the wig regularly, do not wash it frequently. 2. Smooth and tidy the wig before putting them into water 3. Wash and care using a little mild shampoo in cold water 4. Clean cold water to rinse it again and towel to blot up the water 5. Hang and dry it naturally,avoid the sunlight directly.', 'Packing List', '1*Wig 1*Wig Cap']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'BERON', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.5 x 6.6 x 1.6 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'BERON'}
Review Text: This used to be my favorite affordable blonde wig but they changed it from a beautiful ash to doll like pee yellow. Totally not the same as all the great reviews before. Skip the ne2 one of this one ladies.....
Review Title: They changed this wig and it’s very bad now!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Fashion Short Bob Wigs 14" Shoulder Length Soft Silk Synthetic Kanekalon Dark Roots Bronzed Brown Color Women’s Wavy Wigs with Free Wig Cap (Ombre Brown)
Review Date: 2018/09/21
Store: SPEEDM
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 6.69 x 9.06 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'SPEEDM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 6.69 x 9.06 inches; 10.56 Ounces', 'UPC': '740247032029'}
Review Text: This one truly surprised me. It’s color was truly gorgeous with caramel and brown combined, very workable cut and perfect curls. Doesn’t shed, comfortable to wear. I wish they made this in longer sizes because I’m in love with these browns but love the look of longer hair, too. Very cute and can’t beat that price!
Review Title: Very gorgeous browns, cut and can’t beat that price!,
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Long Pink Wigs Women Curls Wavy Cosplay Wig Natural Synthetic Hair Wig For Girls Ladies With Wig Cap 26"(Rose gold))
Review Date: 2018/10/12
Store: LEDAOU
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'LEDAOU', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.4 x 6.2 x 2.1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '680727698980'}
Review Text: Incredible color , ( borders light auburn, strAwberry blond, light peach, not pink) incredible curls and style. I did ship a few inches off. It has less shedding and tangling than most but still tangles and doesn’t have the pre plucked hairline. It’s comfortable to wear longer periods of time and for this price, it’s totally worth it!
Review Title: Amazing color and price!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GOTTA Bleach Blonde Bob Short Medium Length Wigs for Wwomen 14'' Straight Ombre Synthetic Hair Full with Bang Hair Replacement Wig, Dark Brown to Bleach Blonde(T4/16)
Review Date: 2018/11/12
Store: GOTTA
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'GOTTA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.9 x 8 x 2.2 inches; 6.08 Ounces'}
Review Text: The wig has so much potential as the hair quality doesn’t shed and the cut( albeit not my favorite look on me is cute) The color and roots are much darker than the photo, almost a mousy brown versus the lighter blond shown in some other reviewers photos. If there was a lighter blond available at some point, please bring it back. The color here just was too egh boring and blah for my taste. There was also tracks showing on one side so it’s not good to try and pass off as anything more than a photo opp wig really and for $22 I felt it wasn’t worth it....
Review Title: Skip this one and here’s why
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LVMIX Platinum Blonde Wig 13×6 Deep Part Bob Lace Front Wigs 14’’ Natural Hair Hairline Silky Straight Wigs for Women #613 Synthetic Hair Repalcement Wig
Review Date: 2019/06/08
Store: LVMIX
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'LVMIX', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 7.36 x 1.54 inches; 10.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '682559263312'}
Review Text: Gorgeous, gorgeous natural looking believable blonde unit, glue-less, and hair is AMAZING. Feels like real hair! I wish they had these in ashier shades of blonde versus more the 613 yellow but it’s fine for most. I use pro makeup lines to dip my wigs to change color, or spray can them fun shades. I bought the longer version of this one as well but I noticed it tangles a bit more easily than this length did. Very impressed.
Review Title: Impressive, and a well made unit!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality synthetic wigs, particularly favoring natural-looking textures and colors that lean towards blonde and brown shades. Key patterns indicate a distinct appreciation for vibrant color options but a tendency towards disappointment when products fail to meet these expectations; reviews often reflect frustration with color inconsistencies and quality changes over time. There is a clear enjoyment of wavy styles and curls, contrasting with a lesser appreciation for straight wigs, which are frequently criticized for lackluster color options.

Price sensitivity is notable, as the consumer frequently praises affordability, suggesting a strong desire for value without sacrificing aesthetics or comfort. This is supported by positive commentary on wigs that deliver good quality at low prices. 

Lastly, reviews often emphasize wearability and comfort, indicating that prolonged use is important. The customer is dissatisfied with wigs that tangle or shed excessively but appreciates products that maintain their form and style over time. Overall, the core preferences highlight a focus on color vibrancy, natural appearance, competitive pricing, and reliability in product quality.

target_interaction.title: Amazing quality, great light brown color, flawless front hairline!
target_interaction.text: One of the best well made wigs I’ve found here on Amazon and I probably have bought 100 of them! I tend to look for the blonde ones bu5 this is around my natural hair color. Many browns in wigs are either too dark or greenish tint or zero Dimension and come off as “ wiggy” Not this one! It’s a gorgeous color: a lighter auburn brown but not too red( important to me) The hairline must be the best for a straight front lace wig. Truly a cinch to make look believable right out of the box. It doesn’t require glue at all and is very comfortable to your head and is the right size. Hair quality is supreme, soft, doesn’t tangle easily. I am trying out more of this brsnd’s wigs as I’ve been impressed so far!
target_interaction.title_meta: ALICE 13x6 Lace Front Brown Wig, 22" Long Deep Part Silky Straight Synthetic Flaxen Brown Wig for Women, Pre Plucked with Natural Hairline and Baby Hair
